alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:23PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lander and northwestern Nye Counties through 215 PM PDT... At 123 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 24 miles west of Kingston, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Pass Summit, Railroad Pass, Reese River Valley, Ione and Caroll Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
